description: Lemmas applicable to Counterexample Search frontier

constraints_from_our_lemmas.name: tau_S_le_2
constraints_from_our_lemmas.implication: Counterexample must have τ(T_e \ S_e) > 2·ν - 2 for all e

constraints_from_our_lemmas.name: intersecting_family_structure
constraints_from_our_lemmas.implication: Counterexample can't have all triangles pairwise sharing

constraints_from_our_lemmas.name: inductive_bound
constraints_from_our_lemmas.implication: Need both T_e AND rest to be 'bad'

literature_constraints.why: max average degree < 7 graphs satisfy Tuza
Low degree vertices can be removed

counterexample_lemmas_to_formalize.name: counterexample_χ_lower_bound
counterexample_lemmas_to_formalize.lean_sketch: lemma counterex_chromatic (G : SimpleGraph V) (h : coveringNumber G > 2 * packingNumber G) : chromaticNumber G ≥ 5

counterexample_lemmas_to_formalize.name: counterexample_treewidth_lower_bound
counterexample_lemmas_to_formalize.lean_sketch: lemma counterex_treewidth (G : SimpleGraph V) (h : coveringNumber G > 2 * packingNumber G) : treewidth G ≥ 7

counterexample_lemmas_to_formalize.name: counterexample_minimum_degree
counterexample_lemmas_to_formalize.statement: Minimal counterexample has min degree > n/2
counterexample_lemmas_to_formalize.lean_sketch: lemma minimal_counterex_degree (G : SimpleGraph V) (h : isMinimalCounterexample G) : ∀ v, degree G v > Fintype.card V / 2

search_strategies.description: Non-abelian group Cayley graphs can have high chromatic number
search_strategies.why_promising: Algebraic structure might evade our lemmas
Can build up chromatic number while controlling ν
High symmetry might prevent good covers

our_counterexample_experience.K4_counterexample: Disproved 'cover with 2 edges OF e' for S_e
our_counterexample_experience.lesson: Our counterexamples eliminate STRATEGIES, not the conjecture. Need to search HARDER.

formalization_for_search.is_potential_counterexample: def isPotentialCounterexample (G : SimpleGraph V) : Prop := coveringNumber G > 2 * packingNumber G
formalization_for_search.necessary_conditions: def passesNecessaryConditions (G : SimpleGraph V) : Prop := chromaticNumber G ≥ 5 ∧ treewidth G ≥ 7 ∧ packingNumber G ≥ 4
formalization_for_search.decidable_for_finite: For finite V with DecidableEq, can check all conditions
